content.question: A. Explain how technology contributes to the cultural landscape shown in Image 2. B. Describe TWO ways that urbanization may produce new forms of cultural ideas and practices. C. Explain a limitation of using the images to understand how colonialism spread cultural patterns and practices from the location shown in Image 2 to the location shown in Image 1. D. Explain how shared public spaces relate to the concept of placemaking in urban areas. E. Explain the degree to which features in a cultural landscape relate to a country’s political boundaries.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
